Any errors here will be handled in MutateQueryWithPipeline
Check the next stages to be one of the allowed stages.

Pre-checks the $changeStream pipeline stages to ensure that only supported stages are added to the $changestream pipeline, also ensures that $changeStream is the first stage in the pipeline. This function is called before the pipeline is mutated. It also checks if the feature is enabled.
Stage %s is not permitted in a $changeStream pipeline
